revised_title: Motor Roots of the Brachial Plexus and Dilator Nerve of the Iris
tldr: The author investigates the motor roots of the brachial plexus and discovers that the second dorsal root is responsible for controlling the intrinsic muscles of the hand. Additionally, the author finds that the dilator nerve of the iris comes from the anterior root of the second dorsal nerve in both monkeys and humans.
